titleStmt.title: Fiue godly, and profitable sermons concerning 1 The slaverie of sinne. 2 The mischiefe of ignorance. 3 The roote of apostasie. 4 The benefit of Gods service. 5 The Christians loue. Preached in his life time in sundry places. By that late faithfull minister of Christ Mr William Pemble of Magdalen Hall in the Vniversity of Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Pemble, William, 1592?-1623.
Tombes, John, 1603?-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield, printer to the famous Vniversitie, and are to be sold by Edward Forrest,

notesStmt.note: Editor's note "To the reader" signed: Iohn Tombes.
"The mischiefe of ignorance" (running title) begins new pagination and register.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
